skills.skill: IATA, DOT, IMDG, OSHA Right to Know

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform inventory management tasks including monitoring inventory movement, conducting cycle counting, and reporting
Handle shipping coordination activities such as shipping customer material and preparing shipping documentation
Manage inventory-related customer service functions and communicate with customers
Conduct purchasing functions including back order reporting, direct factory shipments, and document control
Responsible for handling hazardous materials and performing related activities
Utilize computer systems for job duties and meet safety, performance, and quality goals
Create programs for enhanced service efficiencies and interface with sales representatives

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required
